sentences.en: Georgos was assigned to successive sets of foster - parents.
sentences.cn: 乔戈斯先后被托付给几对养父母抚养.

sentences.en: In successive steps, a high - energy electron creates a shower.
sentences.cn: 在级联的情况下, 高能 电子可以引起簇射.

sentences.en: In Tokyo share prices have plummeted for the sixth successive day.
sentences.cn: 东京股价已连续第6天猛跌。

sentences.en: It rained ( for ) three successive days.
Next read only the first sentence of each successive paragraph.
sentences.cn: 继而读下面的每一段落的首句.

sentences.en: Subsistence has been increased and perfected by a series of successive arts.
sentences.cn: 生活资料是由一系列顺序相承的技术使之增加并臻于完美的.

sentences.en: Successive governments have tried to deal with this issue.
sentences.cn: 历届政府都试图解决这个问题。

sentences.en: Successive improvements and modification led to modern models of high capacity.
sentences.cn: 经过不断地改进和完善导致高生产能力的新型装置.

sentences.en: Successive transmissions of the same message are decreasingly accurate.
sentences.cn: 连续地传递同样的讯息,其精确性会逐渐降低.

sentences.en: Successive wave fronts in this case form a series of concentric spheres.
sentences.cn: 相继波前形成了一系列的同心球面.

sentences.en: The marksman squeezed off successive rounds and every one told.
sentences.cn: 射击运动员连扣板机,弹无虚发.

sentences.en: The rule of combination of symmetry operations is successive performance of them.
sentences.cn: 对称操作的组合规则,是逐次地去运用它们.

sentences.en: The successive approximation converter is of medium speed, and average resolution.
sentences.cn: 逐次逼近式转换器具有中等的速度和分辨率.

sentences.en: The successive coils are wound in alternate directions.
sentences.cn: 相邻的线圈是按交替的方向绕制的.

sentences.en: The team has had five successive victories.
sentences.cn: 这支球队已经连胜五场了。

words.tran_cn: 连续的,系列的,持续的,顺序的,直线的

phrases.tran_cn: 连续的近似值；连续的学习步骤；逐次近似计算法

trans.tran_cn: 连续的，相继的，继承的，接替的，逐次
trans.tran_en: coming or following one after the other
